actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for an increase in the amount of student loans that are eligible for forgiveness in exchange for the service of the individual as a teacher.

summary.text: Quality Teacher Recruitment Act of 2001 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to: (1) expand eligibility for student loan forgiveness for certain service as an elementary or secondary school teacher (by eliminating a current requirement that such service be in a school with a high concentration of low-income students); and (2) increase from $5,000 to $17,750 the amount of student loans that may be forgiven for such service, under specified guaranteed and direct student loan programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for an increase in the amount of student loans that are eligible for forgiveness in exchange for the service of the individual as a teacher.
